lyric:
[ti:Thinking Out Loud]
[ar:Ed Sheeran]
[al:X (Deluxe Edition)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.46]Thinking Out Loud - Ed Sheeran
[00:01.52]When your legs don't work
[00:03.14]Like they used to before
[00:04.54]
[00:07.51]And I can't sweep you off of your feet
[00:09.68]
[00:13.59]Will your mouth
[00:14.42]Still remember the taste of my love 
[00:16.49]
[00:19.66]Will your eyes
[00:20.49]Still smile from your cheeks 
[00:22.48]
[00:23.76]And  darling 
[00:24.28]I will be loving you 'til we're 70
[00:30.56]
[00:35.84]And  baby 
[00:36.31]My heart could still fall as hard at 23
[00:43.95]
[00:46.21]And I'm thinking 'bout
[00:47.86]How people fall in love in mysterious ways
[00:53.74]
[00:55.02]Maybe just the touch of a hand
[00:58.41]
[01:00.83]Well  me
[01:01.38]I fall in love with you every single day
[01:05.80]
[01:07.01]And I just wanna tell you I am
[01:11.18]
[01:11.94]So honey now
[01:13.94]
[01:17.29]Take me into your loving arms
[01:19.80]
[01:23.36]Kiss me under the light of a thousand stars
[01:27.12]
[01:29.41]Place your head on my beating heart
[01:31.93]
[01:34.18]I'm thinking out loud
[01:36.68]That maybe we found love
[01:39.84]Right where we are
[01:42.15]
[01:44.70]When my hair's all
[01:45.82]But gone and my memory fades
[01:47.72]
[01:50.77]And the crowds don't remember my name
[01:53.22]
[01:56.80]When my hands don't play
[01:59.24]The strings the same way
[02:00.78]
[02:02.87]I know you will still love me the same
[02:05.43]
[02:07.00]'Cause honey your soul could never grow old 
[02:12.92]It's evergreen
[02:14.34]
[02:19.20]And  baby  your smile's forever
[02:22.68]In my mind and memory
[02:26.46]
[02:29.63]I'm thinking 'bout how people
[02:32.79]Fall in love in mysterious ways
[02:36.97]
[02:38.21]Maybe it's all part of a plan
[02:43.29]
[02:44.31]Well  I'll just keep on
[02:45.76]Making the same mistakes
[02:49.55]
[02:50.40]Hoping that you'll understand
[02:54.85]
[02:55.60]But  baby  now
[02:56.88]
[03:00.63]Take me into your loving arms
[03:03.01]
[03:06.68]Kiss me under the light of a thousand stars
[03:10.37]
[03:12.79]Place your head on my beating heart
[03:15.17]
[03:17.04]Thinking out loud
[03:19.24]
[03:19.95]That maybe we found love
[03:22.64]
[03:23.16]Right where we are
[03:26.08]
[03:50.44]So  baby  now
[03:52.29]
[03:55.26]Take me into your loving arms
[03:58.35]
[04:01.31]Kiss me under the light
[04:02.92]Of a thousand stars
[04:05.12]
[04:05.87]Oh  darling  place your head
[04:08.32]On my beating heart
[04:09.90]
[04:11.68]I'm thinking out loud
[04:13.91]
[04:14.56]That maybe we found love
[04:17.31]
[04:17.84]Right where we are
[04:20.03]
[04:20.65]Oh  baby  we found love
[04:23.73]Right where we are
[04:27.08]And we found love right where we are
[999:00.00]***歌词来自第三方***
